cards.name: A Deal Signed in Blood Magic
cards.desc: Target up to 3 monsters you control; destroy them, and if you do, take control of your opponent's monsters up to the number of monsters you destroyed to activate this card. If you control a monster originally owned by your opponent, you can banish this card from your GY; all monsters you control gain 700 ATK until the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "A Deal Signed in Blood Magic" once per Duel.

cards.name: A Deal Signed in Blood Magic
cards.desc: Target up to 3 monsters you control; destroy them, and if you do, take control of your opponent's monsters up to the number of monsters you destroyed to activate this card. If you control a monster originally owned by your opponent, you can banish this card from your GY; all monsters you control gain 700 ATK until the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "A Deal Signed in Blood Magic" once per Duel.

cards.name: A Tyrant's Duty
cards.desc: When this card is activated: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap you control; Special Summon 1 "Dwarf" monster from your Deck. While this card is face-up on the field, all "Casteless Dwarf" you control gain 500 ATK and cannot be targeted by card effects. You can only activate 1 "A Tyrant's Duty" per turn.

cards.name: Abomination
cards.desc:
(This card is always treated as a "Demon" card)
If this card is added to your hand by a card effect: You can Special Summon it. You can only Special Summon "Abomination" once per turn this way. If this card leaves the field, banish it.

cards.name: Allure of the Tainted Eluvian
cards.desc: Tribute 1 monster you control; Draw 2 cards. When this card is in your GY: You can banish 1 monster in your GY; shuffle this card into the Deck.

cards.name: Steel Guardian
cards.cardText: Taunt. Takes half damage from spells.
cards.flavor: Forged in the eternal flames of the underworld.
